SEARCH
Package org.jboss.elemento

Interface Attachable

public interface Attachable
Interface to get notified when an element has been attached / detached from the DOM.

Important:
The attach(MutationRecord) / detach(MutationRecord) methods are only called once after the attachable implementation has been registered with register(HTMLElement, Attachable). If you hold a reference to the element, and the element is attached to the DOM again, the callbacks are not called again, unless the element has been registered again. This is done for reasons of optimisation and performance. 

public class Greeting implements IsElement<HTMLElement>, Attachable {

    private final HTMLElement root;

    Greeting(String name) {
        root = div().text("Hello " + name).element();
        Attachable.register(root, this);
    }

    @Override
    public void attach(MutationRecord mutationRecord) {
        console.log("Greeting has been attached to the DOM!");
    }

    @Override
    public HTMLElement element() {
        return root;
    }

    public static void init() {
        body().add(new Greeting("Smilla"));
    }
}
